dmca.title: Opel wants concept car pic de-blogged
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam, 

Thank you very much far the immediate reply to my request as you can find attached. May I kindly inform you about a copyright infringement on a page that is owned by your company? The picture described as Opel Agilo was taken by our company (screenshot attached), and publishing of this picture is not permitted. Please remove this picture from the below mentioned page and all other pages as e.g. link pages to this page.
 
The permalink of the post: 
http://carscoop.blogspot.com/2007/0212008-opel-agila-rendering-or-opels.html 
Post title:
